review: Cancelled cable tv and ordered 2 sticks.  Money savers.
author: book fan

review: Had this less than a week and it's stuck on the homepage and the remote won't die anything ?????  Tried changing batteries but still nothing !!!
author: Robert Leary

review: The device was not working could not connect to WiFi while other devices in the household had no problem. Asked that they send me a new one and will see how that works.
author: Brian Hostetter

review: I like the concept and thought that having prime would allow me more options for free shows/movies but so far all I've gotten is the first episode free, after that I'm told I have to buy additional episodes which I feel defeats the purpose of prime
author: dawn h. erskine

review: Love it works really well also very easy to set up
author: Lakeshia

review: Had issues when i plugged into my Smart TV  while testing (wifi in Smart TV causes it to drop) but when plugged into its intended TV in bedroom it has worked perfectly. A+
author: mr s l mcgill

review: Works great!  Easy to set up and use.
author: Chris C.

review: Very impressed. Would recommend buying it if you don't want to pay for cable anymore. Netflix and Showtime is the way to go!
author: Alex Ramos

review: I am very much enjoying the firestick, I can enjoy watching everything I can even remotely want to see!!
author: Floyd Farque
